content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a current status of EntityStatus.WORKING, capable of processing iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items being inserted. Monitor the iron ore count to avoid over-inserting.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Make sure to check the current status and item counts in the furnace before extracting to avoid unnecessary operations when the furnace is not ready.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
